name: Unsalted Butter
details: Pure butter with no added salt, ideal for baking and cooking where precise salt control is needed.

name: Salted Butter
details: Contains added salt for enhanced flavor, commonly used for spreading and cooking.

name: Clarified Butter
details: Butter with milk solids and water removed, used in high-heat cooking and frying.

name: Ghee
details: A type of clarified butter commonly used in Indian and Middle Eastern cuisine, known for its nutty flavor.

name: European Style Butter
details: Contains a higher butterfat percentage (82-85%) for a richer, creamier texture and taste.

name: Whipped Butter
details: Incorporates air for a lighter, spreadable texture, often used as a table butter.

name: Vegan Butter
details: A plant-based alternative made from oils such as coconut, avocado, or soybean, used in dairy-free diets.

name: Cultured Butter
details: Made with fermented cream for a tangy, complex flavor, often used in gourmet dishes.

name: Flavored Butter
details: Butter infused with herbs, spices, or sweeteners, used to enhance various dishes.
